channel.title: Object facing cooking and stop player cooking after movement
channel.description:

[code]if(c.isCooking == false)) { c.stopCooking } [/code]
^^ trying to write something like that can someone explain how to write that method above.trying to make it stop cooking after movement.
[code] case 2728:
c.turnPlayerTo(3030, 3377);[/code]
added this code both in cooking java and actionhander..java no results.
